overview: After leaving her husband because of his outrageous unfaithfulness, Donna decides to apply for a waitress job at the Private Cafe, an elegant and discreet place where she meets sweet Rachel, playful Kitty, Silvia the nympho and Rose, wife of James Cole, a millionaire who despises her and makes her have intercourse with his bodyguards in his presence. A cocktail with the best girls is the main ingredient at this Cafe. It'll quench your thirst in the most perverse way!
title: Private Café
